results.description: England all-rounder Jenny Gunn announces her retirement from international cricket after 259 appearances across the three formats.

results.description: England's Natalie Sciver and Katherine Brunt speak to BBC Sport after announcing their engagement, saying they "want to be ambassadors and role models for boys and girls who want to be who they are".
